thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Insr Insurance Group Q4 Loss From Continuing Operations Widens To NOK 150.2 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Insr Insurance Group Q4 Loss From Continuing Operations Widens To NOK 150.2 Million
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - INSR INSURANCE GROUP ASA:
* Q4 GROSS PREMIUM EARNED NOK 227.8 ‍​ MILLION VERSUS NOK 203.3 MILLION YEAR AGO
* Q4 LOSS FROM CONTINUING. OPERATIONS NOK 150.2 ‍​ MILLION VERSUS LOSS NOK 30.0 MILLION YEAR AGO
* WHEN ALL STAFF REDUCTIONS TAKE EFFECT, NUMBER OF EMPLOYEES ARE DOWN 36% VERSUS SEPT 30 2017‍​
* SAYS EXPECTS CONTINUED PORTFOLIO GROWTH IN 2018 * TARGETS A GROSS COMBINED RATIO IN THE MEDIUM TERM OF 90-92%
* SAYS AND AIMS FOR LOW DOUBLE DIGIT PORTFOLIO GROWTH. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
